your mind you can withdraw 
consent by contacting 
Surestartmonitoring@hscni.
net 
 
Your details will be shared 
initially with the Health and 
Social Care Board who will 
use the details to identify 
the relevant local Sure Start 
provider before passing them 
on. Once Sure Start have 
your details they will contact 
you to provide information on 
the services they provide. If 
you avail of services further 
information on how your 
personal information is 
processed will be provided
